subItems.label: Upload a high-quality profile picture
Make sure your face takes up at least 60% of the frame
Dress professionally and make sure the background is neutral
Create a catchy and descriptive headline
Include keywords relevant to your industry
Having a cover image makes you stand out
Choose the right image that represents you and your brand
Add information to the image to provide context
Write a compelling summary that highlights your skills and experience
Include your career objectives and goals
Use bullet points to make your summary easy to read
List your work experience in reverse chronological order
Include your job title, company name, location, and employment dates
Highlight your accomplishments and use numbers to quantify your results
Include any relevant certifications, awards, or publications
List your education in reverse chronological order
Include your degree, major, school name, and graduation date
Highlight any academic honors, awards, or extracurricular activities
List your skills and expertise
Include keywords relevant to your industry
Endorse your colleagues and ask them to endorse you
Connect with professionals in your industry
Personalize your connection requests
Join LinkedIn groups and participate in discussions
Ask for recommendations from colleagues and supervisors
Write personalized recommendations for your connections
Display your recommendations on your profile
Share relevant and informative content on your feed
Comment on and like posts from your connections
Participate in industry-related discussions and groups
Engage with thought leaders and influencers in your industry
Make your profile public and searchable
Include keywords relevant to your industry in your profile
Customize your profile URL to make it more memorable
Add multimedia to your profile, such as videos and presentations
Include your contact information and website links
Update your profile regularly to showcase your latest achievements
